class.name: BTRepeatUntilFailure
class.brief_description: BT decorator that repeats its child task until [code]FAILURE[/code].
class.description: BTRepeatUntilFailure repeats its child task until it results in [code]FAILURE[/code]. Returns [code]RUNNING[/code] if the child task results in [code]RUNNING[/code] or [code]SUCCESS[/code]. Returns [code]SUCCESS[/code] if the child task results in [code]FAILURE[/code].
